full_summary:
================

### Tender Announcement
#### Cancelled - AR22SLGB

**Tender Reference** | PW-22-01015935
**Publication Date** | 2022-12-06
**Closing Date** | 2026-03-31T14:00:00

The government has cancelled the tender announcement for the procurement of construction services under the trade agreements:
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

The bid is open to contractors from the United States, Canada, Europe, and Mexico. The services required for this project fall under the following General Standards for Information Systems Procurement Classification (GSIN) categories:
- Construction of One and Two Dwelling Buildings
- Construction of Multi-Dwelling Buildings
- Construction of Warehouses and Industrial Buildings
- Construction of Commercial Buildings
- Construction of Other Buildings
- Construction Services, Not Elsewhere Specified
- General Heavy Construction
- Other Special Trade Construction Work

The tender is subject to the Canada's procurement laws and regulations, with the winning bidder required to comply with the Defence Construction Canada (DCC) procurement processes.

### Contact Information
For any inquiries regarding this cancelled tender, please contact:
- Name: Mark Smith
- Email: [mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
- Phone: 613-859-0549

The DDC is responsible for deliveries to the region of Newfoundland and Labrador. All other inquiries and communications related to this project should be directed to the DDC.

DCC's contact address is:
- Constitution Square, 19th Floor, 350 Albert Street
- Ottawa, Ontario
- K1A 0K3
- Canada

Please note that all correspondence and submissions should be addressed to the above-mentioned address.

### Pre-qualification for this project is not Required. 

You are welcome to reply to this email if you have any further inquiries.
